Package game

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
game.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
The GameLogic class is the class that control logics during the day

    • updateUnitTerritory

      public static void updateUnitTerritory(BaseUnit unit, boolean isAdded)
      Updates both the attack territory and move territory based on the unit's position and attack range.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit for which to update the unit territory.
      isAdded - true to set the tiles in the unitterritory, false to clear them.

    • updateAttackTerritory

      Updates the attack territory based on the unit's position and attack range.
      Parameters:

      isAttackTerritory - true to set the tiles in the attack territory, false to clear them.

    • updateMoveTerritory

      public static void updateMoveTerritory(BaseUnit unit, boolean isMoveTerritory)
      Updates the move territory based on the unit's position and move range.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit for which to update the move territory.
      isMoveTerritory - true to set the tiles in the move territory, false to clear them.

    • updateDay

      public static void updateDay()
      Updates the game state at the start of a new day. This includes enemy movement, resetting unit move status, and updating resources and population.

    • resetUnitMove

      public static void resetUnitMove()
      Resets the move status of all units. Sets the "moved" status of all units to false.

    • isInAttackRange

      public static boolean isInAttackRange(BaseUnit from, Position pos)
      Checks if a position is within the attack range of a unit.
      Parameters:
      from - The attacking unit.
      pos - The target position.
      Returns:
      true if the position is within the attack range, false otherwise.

    • enemyMove

      public static void enemyMove()
      Executes enemy movement. Each enemy unit selects the closest target unit or building and either attacks or moves towards it.

    • moveUnitUsingShortestPath

      public static void moveUnitUsingShortestPath(BaseUnit unit, Position pos)
      Moves a unit towards a target position using the shortest path.
      Parameters:
      unit - The unit to move.
      pos - The target position.

    • getBestPointFromMove

      public static int getBestPointFromMove(int from, int to, int range)
      Calculates the best point to move to given the current position, target position, and movement range. This ensures that the unit moves towards the target while staying within its movement range.
      Parameters:
      from - The current position coordinate.
      to - The target position coordinate.
      range - The movement range of the unit.
      Returns:
      The best coordinate to move to.

    • closestOurUnitFrom

      public static BaseUnit closestOurUnitFrom(BaseUnit enemy)
      Finds the closest unit among our units to a given enemy unit.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy unit.
      Returns:
      The closest unit among our units.

    • closestOurBuildingFrom

      public static BaseBuilding closestOurBuildingFrom(BaseUnit enemy)
      Finds the closest building among our buildings to a given enemy unit.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy unit.
      Returns:
      The closest building among our buildings.

    • isGameOver

      public static boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over. The game is over if there are no buildings remaining and the current day has exceeded the preparation wave number times the day per wave.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • isGameClear

      public static boolean isGameClear()
      Checks if the game is cleared. The game is cleared if all tiles on the map are covered or if the current day has exceeded the sum of the preparation wave number and enemy wave number times the day per wave.
      Returns:
      true if the game is cleared, false otherwise.
